title: Wilson's Stump Grinding
description: A nextjs site built for a local small business owner. I worked with the client to design and build out his dream small business website. Built with nextjs and plain css. This project taught me how to work directly with a client, and how to send images serverlessly via email (using nodemailer, and remembering to encode and decode from base64).

title: Code Editor
description: A code editor I built using CodeMirror, React, and Sass. Users should be able to write html, css, and javascript code, and execute it in the iframe below.

title: This Website
description: A portfolio site I built to display my work using React & Tailwind.

title: Collectible Shop
description: An ecommerce site for an imaginary collectible shop, built with React, Typescript, and Snipcart.
